item.title: Votwo gonna do? Triathlon triumphs
item.author: Hugh A M Mackenzie,
item.description: The first event of a year is always a tough race, but this one was at Dorney Lake; a well-established, flat course with beautiful smooth roads. This short Votwo Gatorade 5k/20k/5k duathlon is always a good lung opener to start your season. To make the most of the potential for a PB, a number of â€¦
